spectral_sight+5.title: Veil Piercing Perception
spectral_sight+5.description: Develop the ability to perceive beyond mortal limitations, gaining 5 points of spectral sight. Glimpse entities through walls and see into the ethereal planes that overlay our reality.

ghost_health+5.title: Ethereal Protection
ghost_health+5.description: Manifest a shield of spectral energy around your form, gaining 5 points of ghost health. This ethereal barrier absorbs damage before your physical body is harmed.

magic_protection+5.title: Mystic Barrier
magic_protection+5.description: Weave protective enchantments into your very essence, gaining 5 points of magic protection. Arcane defenses shield your body and soul from magical harm of all kinds.

overheal.title: Life Essence Overflow
overheal.description: Your body can temporarily sustain more life energy than normal, allowing healing to exceed your maximum health by 5%. This excess vitality gradually fades over time but provides crucial protection in dangerous situations.

healing_received.title: Vitality Amplification
healing_received.description: Your body resonates with life-giving energies, increasing healing received by 10%. Potions, regeneration effects, and other healing sources restore significantly more health, making recovery far more efficient.

nametag_distance.title: Eagle-Eyed Recognition
nametag_distance.description: Your vision sharpens to supernatural clarity, increasing nametag visibility distance by 10 blocks. Identify friends and foes from remarkable distances, gaining critical tactical information before engagement.

mob_detection_range.title: Shadow Walker's Stealth
mob_detection_range.description: Move like a ghost through the wilderness, reducing hostile mob detection range by 20%. Creatures sense your presence only when you draw much closer, allowing for stealthy approaches and safer exploration.

phase.title: Ethereal Existence
phase.description: Your physical form occasionally slips between dimensions, gaining 20% phasing ability. Parts of your body can momentarily exist slightly out of phase with normal reality, allowing limited movement through solid objects.

health+2.title: Heartbound Fortitude
health+2.description: Channel inner strength to permanently increase maximum health by 1 heart, allowing you to endure greater challenges.

health+4.title: Warrior's Resilience
health+4.description: Harness battle-hardened vitality to increase maximum health by 2 hearts, significantly improving your survival in dangerous encounters.

max_mana+50.title: Azure Wellspring Expansion
max_mana+50.description: Widen your arcane channels to increase maximum mana by 50 points, supporting more powerful and frequent spell casting.

mana_regen+10.title: Mystic Aether Flow
mana_regen+10.description: Tune your body to the magical currents of the world, increasing mana regeneration by 10 points to recover faster between spellcasting.

cooldown_reduction+5%.title: Chronomancer's Acceleration
cooldown_reduction+5%.description: Bend time to your will, reducing spell cooldowns by 5% to cast powerful spells more frequently.

spell_power+5%.title: Arcane Amplification
spell_power+5%.description: Focus magical energies more effectively, increasing spell power by 5% to enhance all magical effects and damage.

magic_specialization.title: Archmage's Forbidden Knowledge
magic_specialization.description: Unlock the deepest arcane secrets, gaining 100 max mana and 10% spell power to unleash magical devastation upon your enemies.

minor_armor.title: Hardened Skin
minor_armor.description: Toughen your skin to gain +0.5 armor points, providing a small but helpful defense against physical attacks.

medium_armor.title: Iron Flesh Barrier
medium_armor.description: Develop resilient flesh that grants +1 armor point, noticeably reducing damage from enemy attacks.

minor_knockback_res.title: Steadfast Footing
minor_knockback_res.description: Plant your feet firmly to gain 3% knockback resistance, making you harder to displace in combat.

medium_knockback_res.title: Mountain's Stance
medium_knockback_res.description: Become as immovable as a mountain with 5% knockback resistance, better withstanding powerful attacks.

medium_movement_speed.title: Fleet-Footed
medium_movement_speed.description: Master movement techniques to increase your speed by 3%, allowing for faster travel and combat positioning.

minor_max_mana.title: Arcane Reservoir
minor_max_mana.description: Expand your inner magical reserves to gain 20 additional maximum mana, allowing for more spell casting.

medium_max_mana.title: Mystic Wellspring
medium_max_mana.description: Significantly expand your magical capacity to gain 35 additional maximum mana for extended spellcasting.

major_max_mana.title: Archmage's Reservoir
major_max_mana.description: Master the art of mana storage to gain 50 additional maximum mana, enabling the casting of powerful spell combinations.

minor_mana_regen.title: Mana Flow
minor_mana_regen.description: Attune yourself to magical energies, increasing mana regeneration by 5 to recover faster after spellcasting.

medium_mana_regen.title: Arcane Current
medium_mana_regen.description: Channel magical energies more efficiently to increase mana regeneration by 8, greatly reducing recovery time between spells.

minor_cooldown_reduction.title: Spell Efficiency
minor_cooldown_reduction.description: Learn to weave spells more efficiently, reducing cooldowns by 2% to cast more frequently.

medium_cooldown_reduction.title: Arcane Acceleration
medium_cooldown_reduction.description: Master spell recovery techniques to reduce cooldowns by 4%, allowing significantly faster reuse of powerful spells.

minor_spell_power.title: Arcane Focus
minor_spell_power.description: Learn to focus magical energies more effectively, increasing spell power by 2% for greater magical impact.

medium_spell_power.title: Potent Casting
medium_spell_power.description: Master magical channeling to increase spell power by 4%, significantly enhancing all spell effects.

minor_cast_time_reduction.title: Swift Incantation
minor_cast_time_reduction.description: Perfect your spellcasting technique to reduce casting time by 3%, allowing faster spell execution.

fire_spell_power.title: Pyromancer's Flame
fire_spell_power.description: Attune yourself to fire magic, increasing fire spell power by 5% for more devastating flame-based attacks.

ice_spell_power.title: Cryomancer's Frost
ice_spell_power.description: Harness the power of cold to increase ice spell power by 5%, enhancing all frost-based magic.

lightning_spell_power.title: Stormcaller's Surge
lightning_spell_power.description: Channel the power of storms to increase lightning spell power by 5%, electrifying your magical arsenal.

holy_spell_power.title: Divine Channeler
holy_spell_power.description: Connect with divine energies to increase holy spell power by 5%, strengthening healing and sacred magics.

ender_spell_power.title: Void Walker
ender_spell_power.description: Attune yourself to the End's energies to increase ender spell power by 5%, enhancing teleportation and void magic.

blood_spell_power.title: Crimson Ritualist
blood_spell_power.description: Master the forbidden art of blood magic to increase blood spell power by 5%, enhancing life-force manipulation.

evocation_spell_power.title: Summoner's Will
evocation_spell_power.description: Strengthen your command over summoned entities, increasing evocation spell power by 5%.

nature_spell_power.title: Druidic Connection
nature_spell_power.description: Attune yourself to natural energies to increase nature spell power by 5%, enhancing plant and earth magic.

ars_mana_discount.title: Efficient Spellcraft
ars_mana_discount.description: Master magical efficiency to reduce Ars Nouveau spell mana cost by 2%, allowing more spells with the same mana.

absorption_boost.title: Golden Heart Enchantment
absorption_boost.description: Ancient protective magics flow through your veins, increasing maximum absorption by 2 hearts. Your body can now maintain more powerful magical shields, creating golden hearts that absorb damage before your life force.

magic_protection.title: Arcane Ward Enchantment
magic_protection.description: Protective sigils manifest across your skin, granting 5 points of magic protection. Hostile spells and magical damage are partially absorbed by these mystical wards, leaving you less vulnerable to arcane attacks.

ars_saturation.title: Arcane Nourishment
ars_saturation.description: The magical energies flowing through you now sustain your physical form, providing 5 points of magical saturation. Casting spells occasionally fills your hunger bar, converting raw arcane power into bodily nourishment.

ars_feather.title: Zephyr's Divine Grace
ars_feather.description: While channeling arcane energies, air itself cushions your falls. When actively casting spells, you descend as gently as a feather, never taking damage from even the highest drops as magic buoys your descent.

eldritch_spell_power.title: Forbidden Knowledge Wielder
eldritch_spell_power.description: Your mind has glimpsed beyond the veil of reality, increasing eldritch spell power by 5%. Channel cosmic forces with greater potency as your understanding of impossible geometries grows deeper.

summon_damage.title: Conjurer's Empowerment
summon_damage.description: The creatures you conjure manifest with greater ferocity, dealing 5% more damage. Your summoned allies strike with supernatural precision and power, tearing through enemies with enhanced fury.
